name: Trick or Boom
description:
Controls:

Keyboard: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT for movement

Spacebar: Lays Bombs

Objective: Help Jacques destroy all the spider talismans that the slime monsters have put around his graveyard in order to banish them for good. When all three talismans are destroyed a gateway to the next level will open in the center of the map.

This game is a work in progress. I consider it a prototype in Phaser of a full experience that will be coming soon in Unity! I will try to update with news when I have it. For best experience, play full screen.

Known glitch: the counter for the lives will sometimes generate a second counter right next to it. I'm looking into resolving this bug.
